name: The Courtyard
description: A walled square of cracked concrete surrounded by remnants of adobe structures. An archway on the east side, half-collapsed. Desert creeps in through gaps in the walls—salt grass and thorny shrubs.
lighting_quality: Hard shadows and bright patches. At dusk, the walls glow pink-orange. At night, moon creates stark contrasts.
temperature_range: Extreme—baking during day, cold at night. Walls radiate stored heat after sunset.
acoustic_quality: Trapped and echoing. Voices bounce off walls. Hoofbeats sound amplified.
objects_present: Rusted metal chair tipped on its side
architectural_features: Adobe walls with geometric crack patterns
Iron ring mounted in north wall
Wooden beam jutting from south wall
atmosphere: Confrontational. A space that forces proximity and interaction.
